summary: This document is a Master Loan and Security Agreement between Fifth Third Bank and Requiro Scientia LLC, outlining the terms and conditions for loans and advances made by the bank to the borrower. It details the obligations of the borrower, the rights of the lender, and the conditions under which loans may be extended, including security interests in equipment and other collateral.

persons.name: Ramona Vickers
persons.context: Ramona Vickers is listed as the contact person for Requiro Scientia LLC in the agreement.

keyFacts: Fifth Third Bank is the lender, and Requiro Scientia LLC is the borrower.
The agreement outlines the terms for loans and advances, including security interests in equipment.
Borrower must notify the lender of any events of default or loss of equipment.
The agreement includes provisions for insurance coverage and maintenance of the equipment.
